testcase.name: verifyLinksAreBrockenOrNot

failure.message: The following asserts failed: https://demoqa.com/bad-request is brcken with status code = 400 expected [true] but found [false], https://demoqa.com/unauthorized is brcken with status code = 401 expected [true] but found [false], https://demoqa.com/forbidden is brcken with status code = 403 expected [true] but found [false], https://demoqa.com/invalid-url is brcken with status code = 404 expected [true] but found [false]
